errors.description: Missing 'U.S.' abbreviation in U.S. Constitution citation
errors.violation: Rule 11 requires abbreviating 'U.S. Constitution' to 'U.S. Const.' in citations
errors.remediation: Use 'U.S. Const.' abbreviation for U.S. Constitution citations

errors.description: Using full 'U.S. Constitution' instead of abbreviated form in citation
errors.violation: Rule 11 mandates abbreviation in citation format
errors.remediation: Always abbreviate U.S. Constitution to 'U.S. Const.' in citations

errors.description: Missing state abbreviation in state constitution citation
errors.violation: Rule 11 requires state abbreviation for state constitutions (e.g., 'N.Y. Const.')
errors.remediation: Include state abbreviation in state constitution citations

errors.description: Incorrect state abbreviation used in state constitution citation
errors.violation: Rule 11 requires accurate state abbreviations
errors.example_incorrect: Ca. Const. art. I, § 1 (should be Cal.)
errors.remediation: Use correct state abbreviation per Bluebook Table 10

errors.description: Including unnecessary date in constitution citation
errors.violation: Rule 11 states: 'Do not include dates for constitutions in citations'
errors.remediation: Remove date from constitution citations unless specifically discussing historical versions

errors.description: Incorrect article notation abbreviation
errors.violation: Rule 11 requires proper abbreviations like 'art.' for articles
errors.remediation: Use 'art.' for article, 'amend.' for amendment abbreviations

errors.description: Missing section symbol (§) in constitution citation
errors.violation: Rule 11 requires section symbols for constitutional sections
errors.remediation: Include section symbol (§) before section numbers

errors.description: Using 'Amendment' instead of abbreviated 'amend.'
errors.violation: Rule 11 requires abbreviations including 'amend.' for amendments
errors.remediation: Abbreviate amendments as 'amend.'

errors.description: Missing section number when section is referenced
errors.violation: Rule 11 requires section numbers in citations
errors.remediation: Include specific section numbers when available

errors.description: Improper capitalization in constitution citation elements
errors.violation: Rule 11 requires lowercase abbreviations and proper formatting
errors.remediation: Use lowercase for article and amendment abbreviations

errors.description: Improper notation for constitutional clauses
errors.violation: Rule 11 requires proper clause abbreviations like 'cl.'
errors.remediation: Use 'cl.' abbreviation for constitutional clauses

errors.description: Improperly dropping 'U.S.' or state name in subsequent references when context is unclear
errors.violation: Rule 11 allows dropping name only if obvious from context
errors.example_incorrect: First: U.S. Const. art. I, § 8. Later in different section: Const. art. II, § 1
errors.example_correct: First: U.S. Const. art. I, § 8. Later (with clear context): Const. art. II, § 1
errors.remediation: Only drop U.S./state name if immediately clear which constitution is referenced

errors.description: Missing statute title in citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.1 requires statute title or official code reference
errors.remediation: Always include title, code, and section in statute citations

errors.description: Missing code abbreviation (e.g., 'U.S.C.')
errors.violation: Rule 12.1 requires code abbreviation
errors.remediation: Include proper code abbreviation (U.S.C., N.Y. Penal Law, etc.)

errors.description: Incorrect code abbreviation used
errors.violation: Rule 12.1 requires proper code abbreviations
errors.remediation: Use correct code abbreviations per Bluebook Table 1

errors.description: Missing year in parentheses for statute citation
errors.violation: Rule 12 requires year in parentheses
errors.remediation: Include year in parentheses for all statute citations (except current U.S.C. per 21st ed.)

errors.description: Using incorrect year in statute citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.3.2 requires edition year, not effective date
errors.remediation: Use code edition year, not effective date or passage date

errors.description: Missing section symbol (§) in statute citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.1 requires section symbol
errors.remediation: Always include section symbol (§) before section number

errors.description: Missing section number in statute citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.1 requires section number
errors.remediation: Include section number after section symbol

errors.description: Missing double section symbol (§§) for multiple sections
errors.violation: Rule 12 requires §§ for ranges or multiple sections
errors.remediation: Use §§ (double section symbol) for ranges or multiple sections

errors.description: Incorrect format for section range (missing dash or brackets)
errors.violation: Rule 12 requires proper range notation
errors.remediation: Use hyphen/dash for section ranges without 'to' or 'through'

errors.description: Using unofficial code without publisher or year indication
errors.violation: Rule 12.3 requires indication when using unofficial code
errors.remediation: Add publisher and year when using unofficial codes (U.S.C.A., U.S.C.S.)

errors.description: Incorrect supplement notation format
errors.violation: Rule 12.3 requires proper 'Supp.' format for supplements
errors.remediation: Use 'Supp.' abbreviation with year for supplements

errors.description: Missing supplement designation when citing from supplement
errors.violation: Rule 12.3 requires indicating when citing supplement
errors.remediation: Include 'Supp.' designation when statute cited from supplement

errors.description: Citing session law when official code is available
errors.violation: Rule 12.2.1 requires citing official code if available
errors.example_incorrect: Civil Rights Act of 1964, Pub. L. No. 88-352, 78 Stat. 241 (1964)
errors.remediation: Cite official code unless statute not yet codified

errors.description: Missing jurisdiction abbreviation in state statute citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.3 requires state abbreviation for clarity
errors.remediation: Include state abbreviation in state statute citations

errors.description: Incorrect state abbreviation in statute citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.3 requires proper state abbreviations
errors.remediation: Use correct state abbreviation per Bluebook Table 10

errors.description: Using wrong code name abbreviation for state
errors.violation: Rule 12.3 requires proper code name abbreviation per jurisdiction
errors.remediation: Use correct code name abbreviation per Bluebook Table 1

errors.description: Missing publisher designation for unofficial code
errors.violation: Rule 12.3 recommends indicating publisher for unofficial codes
errors.remediation: Add publisher (West, Lexis) for unofficial codes in court documents

errors.description: Incorrect Public Law citation format
errors.violation: Rule 12.4 requires 'Pub. L. No.' format for session laws
errors.remediation: Use 'Pub. L. No.' format for public law citations

errors.description: Incorrect reporter abbreviation in session law citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.4 requires correct reporter abbreviations
errors.remediation: Use 'Stat.' abbreviation for United States Statutes at Large

errors.description: Missing volume number in session law citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.4 requires volume number
errors.remediation: Include volume number before reporter abbreviation

errors.description: Missing page number in session law citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.4 requires page number
errors.remediation: Include page number after reporter abbreviation

errors.description: Missing database currency indicator for online statute
errors.violation: Rule 12.5 requires database and currency information
errors.remediation: Add currency information in parenthetical for electronic databases

errors.description: Incorrect database name or designation
errors.violation: Rule 12.5 requires proper database abbreviations
errors.remediation: Use correct database abbreviations (LEXIS, Westlaw, etc.)

errors.description: Missing parenthetical indicating statute invalidity
errors.violation: Rule 12.7.1 requires noting when statute held unconstitutional
errors.example_correct: 18 U.S.C. § 3501 (2000) (held unconstitutional by Dickerson v. United States, 530 U.S. 428 (2000))
errors.remediation: Add parenthetical indicating basis of invalidation with case citation

errors.description: Incorrect format for invalidation parenthetical
errors.violation: Rule 12.7.1 requires specific format for invalidation citations
errors.example_correct: 18 U.S.C. § 3501 (held unconstitutional by Dickerson v. United States, 530 U.S. 428 (2000))
errors.remediation: Include case citation and year in invalidation parenthetical

errors.description: Missing notation of statute repeal
errors.violation: Rule 12.7.2 may require noting repeal if discussing historical version
errors.remediation: Include repeal information when citing historical statute versions

errors.description: Incorrect format for repeal notation
errors.violation: Rule 12.7.2 requires proper repeal citation format
errors.example_incorrect: 42 U.S.C. § 6000 (repealed by Pub. L. No. 95-91 in 1992)
errors.remediation: Use simplified repeal format: (repealed YEAR)

errors.description: Using 'supra' for statute short form (prohibited by Bluebook)
errors.violation: Rule 12.10 prohibits using 'supra' for statute citations
errors.example_incorrect: Id. at 10. See supra note 5 (quoting 42 U.S.C. § 1983)
errors.remediation: Use Id., statute abbreviation, or full citation; never use supra for statutes

errors.description: Using full citation instead of appropriate short form
errors.violation: Rule 12.10 encourages efficient short forms after full citation
errors.example_incorrect: First cite: 42 U.S.C. § 1983 (2018). Later cite: 42 U.S.C. § 1983 (2018)
errors.remediation: Use abbreviated short form (§ number) when statute previously cited in full

errors.description: Incorrect Internal Revenue Code citation format
errors.violation: Rule 12.9.1 requires 'I.R.C.' for IRC citations
errors.remediation: Use 'I.R.C.' abbreviation for Internal Revenue Code citations

errors.description: Including unnecessary year in IRC citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.9.1 typically omits year for current I.R.C.
errors.remediation: Omit year for current IRC citations unless discussing historical version

errors.description: Missing jurisdiction designation in ordinance citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.9.2 requires jurisdiction identification
errors.remediation: Include municipality and state abbreviation in ordinance citations

errors.description: Missing indication that ordinance is from a code
errors.violation: Rule 12.9.2 requires specifying if ordinal is codified
errors.remediation: Include type of ordinance source (Municipal Code, Ordinance, etc.)

errors.description: Incorrect Federal Rules abbreviation
errors.violation: Rule 12.9.3 requires proper 'Fed. R. [Type] P.' format
errors.remediation: Use 'Fed. R.' abbreviation with correct rule type (Civ., Crim., Evid., App.)

errors.description: Incorrect Federal Rules type abbreviation
errors.violation: Rule 12.9.3 requires correct type (Civ., Crim., Evid., App.)
errors.remediation: Use proper abbreviation: Civ., Crim., Evid., or App.

errors.description: Missing rule number in Federal Rules citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.9.3 requires rule number
errors.remediation: Include specific rule number after rule type

errors.description: Incorrect Model Code abbreviation
errors.violation: Rule 12.9.4 requires proper Model Code citation format
errors.remediation: Use 'Model Penal Code' (not abbreviated) with proper section reference

errors.description: Missing publisher information for Model Code citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.9.4 requires publisher and year
errors.remediation: Include '(Am. Law Inst. YEAR)' in parenthetical

errors.description: Missing edition designation in Restatement citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.9.4 requires edition number
errors.remediation: Include edition: (First), (Second), (Third), etc.

errors.description: Missing year in Restatement citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.9.4 requires year of Restatement publication
errors.remediation: Add '(Am. Law Inst. YEAR)' in parenthetical

errors.description: Incorrect Uniform Commercial Code abbreviation
errors.violation: Rule 12.9.4 requires proper UCC citation format
errors.remediation: Use section symbol and proper UCC abbreviation

errors.description: Missing publisher information for UCC citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.9.4 requires publisher identification
errors.example_correct: U.C.C. § 2-201 (Am. Law Inst. & Unif. Law Comm'n 2017)
errors.remediation: Include '(Am. Law Inst. & Unif. Law Comm'n YEAR)'

errors.description: Incorrect ABA Model Rules citation format
errors.violation: Rule 12.9.5 requires proper ABA Model Rules format
errors.example_incorrect: ABA Model Rules of Professional Conduct 1.7
errors.example_correct: Model Rules of Prof. Conduct r. 1.7
errors.remediation: Use 'Model Rules of Prof. Conduct r.' with rule number and year

errors.description: Missing year in ABA Model Rules citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.9.5 requires year
errors.example_incorrect: Model Rules of Prof. Conduct r. 1.7
errors.example_correct: Model Rules of Prof. Conduct r. 1.7 (Am. Bar Ass'n 2020)
errors.remediation: Add '(Am. Bar Ass'n YEAR)' in parenthetical

errors.description: Incorrect format for ABA ethics opinion citation
errors.violation: Rule 12.9.5 requires specific ethics opinion format
errors.example_correct: ABA Comm. on Ethics & Prof. Resp., Formal Op. 466 (2014)
errors.remediation: Use full format: 'ABA Comm. on Ethics & Prof. Resp., Formal Op. [NUMBER] ([YEAR])'

errors.description: Missing explanatory parenthetical when statute relevance is unclear
errors.violation: Rule 12.8 recommends explanatory parentheticals for clarity
errors.example_correct: 42 U.S.C. § 1983 (2018) (providing federal cause of action for civil rights violations)
errors.remediation: Add parenthetical explaining statute's relevance to proposition

errors.description: Incorrect capitalization in explanatory parenthetical
errors.violation: Rule 12.8 requires lowercase except for proper nouns
errors.remediation: Use lowercase at start of parenthetical unless with proper nouns

errors.description: Missing pinpoint page reference when citing specific part of statute
errors.violation: Best practice to include specific section/subsection when referencing part
errors.remediation: Include specific subsection or paragraph in citation

errors.description: Year placed incorrectly (not at end in parentheses)
errors.violation: Rule 12 requires year in parentheses at end of citation
errors.remediation: Always place year in parentheses at end of citation

errors.description: Missing amendment history when discussing recent changes
errors.violation: Rule 12.7.3 may require noting significant amendments
errors.remediation: Include amendment information when relevant to analysis

errors.description: Missing bill number in legislative material citation
errors.violation: Rule 13.1 requires bill number
errors.remediation: Include chamber designation and bill number

errors.description: Missing chamber designation (H.R. or S.) in bill citation
errors.violation: Rule 13.2 requires chamber identification
errors.remediation: Include H.R. for House bills or S. for Senate bills

errors.description: Missing Congress number in bill citation
errors.violation: Rule 13.2 requires Congress number
errors.remediation: Include Congress number (e.g., '116th Cong.')

errors.description: Incorrect Congress number format
errors.violation: Rule 13.2 requires proper ordinal format
errors.remediation: Use ordinal number with 'Cong.' abbreviation (116th, 117th, etc.)

errors.description: Missing year in bill citation
errors.violation: Rule 13.2 requires year
errors.remediation: Include year in parentheses

errors.description: Incorrect resolution citation format
errors.violation: Rule 13.2 requires proper resolution format
errors.remediation: Use chamber prefix: 'H.R. Res.' for House, 'S. Res.' for Senate

errors.description: Bill title not italicized when included
errors.violation: Rule 13.2 requires italics for bill titles in law review
errors.example_incorrect: Family and Medical Leave Act, H.R. 2500, 117th Cong. (2021)
errors.example_correct: Family and Medical Leave Act, H.R. 2500, 117th Cong. (2021) [italicized]
errors.remediation: Italicize bill titles when included before bill number

errors.description: Missing hearing title in citation
errors.violation: Rule 13.3 requires hearing title
errors.example_incorrect: Data Privacy: Before the S. Comm. on Commerce
errors.example_correct: Data Privacy: Hearing Before the S. Comm. on Commerce, Sci. & Transp., 116th Cong. (2019)
errors.remediation: Include complete hearing title in italics

errors.description: Missing committee name in hearing citation
errors.violation: Rule 13.3 requires committee identification
errors.example_correct: Data Privacy: Hearing Before the S. Comm. on Commerce, Sci. & Transp., 116th Cong. (2019)
errors.remediation: Include full committee name with proper abbreviations

errors.description: Missing Congress number in hearing citation
errors.violation: Rule 13.3 requires Congress designation
errors.example_incorrect: Data Privacy: Hearing Before the S. Comm. on Commerce, Sci. & Transp. (2019)
errors.example_correct: Data Privacy: Hearing Before the S. Comm. on Commerce, Sci. & Transp., 116th Cong. (2019)
errors.remediation: Include Congress number in citation

errors.description: Incorrect Congress number format in hearing
errors.violation: Rule 13.3 requires proper Congress format
errors.example_incorrect: Data Privacy: Hearing Before the S. Comm. on Commerce, 116 Congress (2019)
errors.example_correct: Data Privacy: Hearing Before the S. Comm. on Commerce, 116th Cong. (2019)
errors.remediation: Use ordinal with 'Cong.' abbreviation

errors.description: Missing year in hearing citation
errors.violation: Rule 13.3 requires year
errors.example_incorrect: Data Privacy: Hearing Before the S. Comm. on Commerce, 116th Cong.
errors.example_correct: Data Privacy: Hearing Before the S. Comm. on Commerce, 116th Cong. (2019)
errors.remediation: Always include year in parentheses at end of citation

errors.description: Missing report number in committee report citation
errors.violation: Rule 13.4 requires report number
errors.remediation: Include 'No.' and report number

errors.description: Incorrect chamber designation in report citation
errors.violation: Rule 13.4 requires proper chamber format
errors.remediation: Use 'H.R. Rep.' for House or 'S. Rep.' for Senate

errors.description: Missing Congress number in report citation
errors.violation: Rule 13.4 requires Congress identification
errors.remediation: Include Congress number, e.g., '115th Cong.'

errors.description: Missing year in report citation
errors.violation: Rule 13.4 requires year
errors.remediation: Include year in parentheses at end

errors.description: Incorrect Congressional Record citation format
errors.violation: Rule 13.5 requires 'Cong. Rec.' abbreviation
errors.remediation: Use format: '[VOLUME] Cong. Rec. [PAGE] (daily ed. [DATE])'

errors.description: Missing page number in Congressional Record citation
errors.violation: Rule 13.5 requires page reference
errors.remediation: Include page number with session letter (H for House, S for Senate)

errors.description: Incorrect edition designation in Congressional Record citation
errors.violation: Rule 13.5 requires 'daily ed.' or bound edition format
errors.remediation: Include '(daily ed. DATE)' or specify bound edition year

errors.description: Missing hereinafter designation for long legislative material title
errors.violation: Rule 13.8 permits using 'hereinafter' to avoid repetition
errors.example_incorrect: First cite: Data Privacy: Hearing Before the S. Comm. on Commerce... Later: Data Privacy: Hearing Before the S. Comm. on Commerce...
errors.example_correct: First cite: [full citation] (hereinafter [Short Title]). Later: [Short Title]
errors.remediation: Add hereinafter designation when document has lengthy title

errors.description: Using supra for legislative materials without appropriate hereinafter
errors.violation: Rule 13.8 permits supra with hereinafter but not as primary short form
errors.remediation: Use supra only with hereinafter designation previously established

errors.description: Ambiguous or missing document type designation (report, hearing, print, etc.)
errors.violation: Rule 13.4 requires clear document type identification
errors.remediation: Clearly identify document type: 'H.R. Doc.', 'S. Doc.', 'Comm. Print', etc.
